name: prism blanket
notes:
materials
our [prism blanket bundle][1] comes in crib (throw) sizes and includes…

7 (10) skeins of purl soho’s [good wool][2], 100% andean highland wool. each skein is 383 yards/ 100 grams. 

- mc1: 2 skeins; approximately 435 (725) yards required
- mc2: 2 skeins; approximately 435 (725) yards required
- cc1: 1 (2) skein(s); approximately 290 (510) yards required
- cc2: 1 (2) skein(s); approximately 290 (510) yards required
- cc3: 1 (2) skein(s); approximately 290 (435) yards required

you’ll also need…

- us 6 (4 mm), 24-inch [circular needles][3] 

choose from over a dozen beautiful palettes, [here][4]! we used birthday for the throw size, and campfire, tuber, and rosebush for our crib samples.

gauge
22 stitches and 44 rows (22 ridges) = 4 inches in garter stitch

sizes
crib (throw)

- finished dimensions: 33 (44) inches wide x 44 (55) inches long
- finished square dimensions: 11 inches square

notes
construction
you will work this blanket in one piece, beginning with the bottom left square. you will work in columns, one bias-knit square at a time. when necessary, you will pick up stitches from an adjacent square (or two!) in order to continue seamlessly. don’t worry, it’s easy and we explain everything!


designed for purl soho by [joelle hoverson][5] and [gaby bush][6].


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/prism-blanket-bundle.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/good-wool.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools/knitting-needles.html?type_filter=881
  [4]: https://www.purlsoho.com/prism-blanket-bundle.html
  [5]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/joelle-hoverson-for-purl-soho/
  [6]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/gaby-bush-for-purl-soho/
